languages.text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, губернатор сего великого мира. Прежде всего — примите мои глубочайшие соболезнования. Утрату столь великого человека, коей была Теодора фон Валанциус, трудно пережить. Больно думать, что ее уже нет с нами. Граждане Даргонуса и всего протектората скорбят вместе с вами. Позвольте объявить полугодовой траур, дабы почтить память нашей возлюбленной госпожи".

traits.locale_text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, губернатор сего великого мира. Прежде всего — примите мои глубочайшие соболезнования. Утрату столь великого человека, коей была Теодора фон Валанциус, трудно пережить. Больно думать, что ее уже нет с нами. Граждане Даргонуса и всей торговой империи скорбят вместе с вами. Позвольте объявить полугодовой траур, дабы почтить память нашей возлюбленной госпожи".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."
languages.original_text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, губернатор сего великого мира. Прежде всего — примите мои глубочайшие соболезнования. Утрату столь великого человека, коей была Теодора фон Валанциус, трудно пережить. Больно думать, что ее уже нет с нами. Граждане Даргонуса и всего протектората скорбят вместе с вами. Позвольте объявить полугодовой траур, дабы почтить память нашей возлюбленной госпожи".

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost — please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius was. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. Citizens of Dargonus and all of the trade empire grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we could honor the memory of our beloved lady."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “我是厄本·德莱夫斯塔，这个伟大世界的总督。首先，也是最重要的，请接受我最深切的慰问。失去了像西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯这样伟大的女性，我们很难从这样的打击中恢复过来。一想到她已经离开了我们，我的心里就充满痛苦。达戈努斯的全体公民，以及您属地的所有公民，都会与您一起哀悼她的离世。请允许我们宣布举行为期半年的哀悼，悼念我们敬爱的西奥多拉夫人。”
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."

traits.locale_text: “我是厄本·德莱夫斯塔，这个伟大世界的总督。首先，也是最重要的，请接受我最深切的慰问。失去了像西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯这样伟大的女性，我们很难从这样的打击中恢复过来。一想到她已经离开了我们，我的心里就充满痛苦。达戈努斯的全体公民，以及您属地的所有公民，都会与您一起哀悼她的离世。请允许我们宣布举行为期半年的哀悼，悼念我们敬爱的西奥多拉夫人。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Urbend Drivestem, gobernador de este grandioso mundo. En primer lugar, por favor acepte mi más sentido pésame. Será difícil superar la pérdida de una mujer tan excepcional como Theodora von Valancius. Me duele pensar que ya no está con nosotros. Los ciudadanos de Dargonus y del protectorado entero comparten su pesar. Permítanos decretar medio año de luto para honrar el recuerdo de nuestra querida señora».
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."

traits.locale_text: «Urbend Drivestem, gobernador de este grandioso mundo. En primer lugar, por favor acepte mi más sentido pésame. Será difícil superar la pérdida de una mujer tan excepcional como Theodora von Valancius. Me duele pensar que ya no está con nosotros. Los ciudadanos de Dargonus y del protectorado entero comparten su pesar. Permítanos decretar medio año de luto para honrar el recuerdo de nuestra querida señora».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「この偉大なる世界の総督、ウルベンド・ドライブステムであります。まずはじめに、深い哀悼の意を表します。テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスのような偉大な女性の喪失から立ち直るのは、困難を極めます。彼女がもう我々の側にいないと考えるだけで心痛に耐えません。ダルゴヌスのすべての市民と保護国家は、あなたと共に悲しんでおります。我らが最愛の女性の思い出を称えるために、半年間の服喪を宣言したく存じます」
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."

traits.locale_text: 「この偉大なる世界の総督、ウルベンド・ドライブステムであります。まずはじめに、深い哀悼の意を表します。テオドラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスのような偉大な女性の喪失から立ち直るのは、困難を極めます。彼女がもう我々の側にいないと考えるだけで心痛に耐えません。ダルゴヌスのすべての市民と保護国家は、あなたと共に悲しんでおります。我らが最愛の女性の思い出を称えるために、半年間の服喪を宣言したく存じます」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, Gouverneur dieser großartigen Welt. Bitte nehmt zuallererst meine tiefste Mitleidsbekundung entgegen. Es wird schwer werden, sich von dem Verlust einer so großartigen Frau wie Theodora von Valancius zu erholen. Der Gedanke schmerzt mich, dass sie nicht mehr unter uns weilt. Die Bürger von Dargonus und dem gesamten Protektorat weinen mit Euch. Bitte erlaubt uns, ein halbes Jahr der Trauer anzuberaumen, um unserer geliebten Lady zu gedenken."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, Gouverneur dieser großartigen Welt. Bitte nehmt zuallererst meine tiefste Mitleidsbekundung entgegen. Es wird schwer werden, sich von dem Verlust einer so großartigen Frau wie Theodora von Valancius zu erholen. Der Gedanke schmerzt mich, dass sie nicht mehr unter uns weilt. Die Bürger von Dargonus und dem gesamten Protektorat weinen mit Euch. Bitte erlaubt uns, ein halbes Jahr der Trauer anzuberaumen, um unserer geliebten Lady zu gedenken."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Je suis Urbend Drivestem, gouverneur de ce vaste monde. Avant toute chose, permettez-moi de vous présenter mes plus sincères condoléances. La perte d'une femme telle que Théodora von Valancius est un coup dur dont il nous sera difficile de nous relever. J'ai encore peine à croire qu'elle n'est plus parmi nous, mais soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que les habitants de Dargonus et du protectorat tout entier compatissent à votre douleur. Avec votre autorisation, nous souhaiterions instaurer une période de six mois de deuil en mémoire de notre souveraine bien-aimée. »
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis Urbend Drivestem, gouverneur de ce vaste monde. Avant toute chose, permettez-moi de vous présenter mes plus sincères condoléances. La perte d'une femme telle que Théodora von Valancius est un coup dur dont il nous sera difficile de nous relever. J'ai encore peine à croire qu'elle n'est plus parmi nous, mais soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que les habitants de Dargonus et du protectorat tout entier compatissent à votre douleur. Avec votre autorisation, nous souhaiterions instaurer une période de six mois de deuil en mémoire de notre souveraine bien-aimée. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, bu ulu dünyanın valisiyim. Her şeyden önce lütfen en derin taziyelerimi kabul buyurun. Theodora von Valancius gibi değerli bir hanımefendinin kaybının telafisi çok zor olacak. Artık aramızda olmadığını düşünmek bana acı veriyor. Dargonus vatandaşları ve tüm protektora, sizinle birlikte matem tutuyor. Lütfen değerli leydimizin anısını onurlandırmak adına yarım yıllık bir yas ilan etmemize müsaade edin."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, governor of this great world. First and foremost, please accept my deepest condolences. It will be difficult to recover from the loss of a woman as great as Theodora von Valancius. It pains me to think that she is no longer with us. The citizens of Dargonus and of the entire protectorate grieve alongside you. Please allow us to declare half a year of mourning so that we can honour the memory of our beloved lady."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, bu ulu dünyanın valisi. Her şeyden önce lütfen en derin taziyelerimi kabul buyurun. Theodora von Valancius gibi değerli bir hanımefendinin kaybının telafisi çok zor olacak. Artık aramızda olmadığını düşünmek bile bana acı veriyor. Dargonus vatandaşları ve tüm protektora sizinle birlikte matem içerisinde. Lütfen değerli leydimizin anısını onurlandırabilmek için yarım yıllık bir yas ilan etmemize müsaade edin."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
